content: m stitch marker sm slip marker sl slip purlwise bor beginning of round marker m1lp make one left purlwise m1rp make one right purlwise ssk slip slip knit yo yarn over wan cheng phua © copyright 2024 knittygrittysg com pattern instructions back neck the back piece is worked back and forth in stockinette with german shortrow shaping for the shoulders ds are resolved by working the two legs of the ds with k2tog or p2tog with 3 5 mm needles cast on 71 74 77 79 82 85 88 90 93 sts row 1 rs k18 18 18 18 21 21 24 24 24 sts clip m to st just knitted k until 18 18 18 18 21 21 24 24 24 sts remaining clip m to st just knitted k2 turn row 2 ws make a ds p until 16 16 16 16 19 19 22 22 22 sts remaining turn row 3 make a ds k to previous ds k2tog k3 turn row 4 make a ds p to previous ds p2tog p3 turn repeat the last two row 4 4 4 4 5 5 6 6 6 more times next row make a ds k to previous ds k2tog k1 turn next row p to previous ds p2tog p1 turn continue by working 16 16 16 16 16 18 18 20 20 row of stockinette flat break the yarn place sts on stitch holder front left shoulder the front shoulders are worked back and forth in stockinette with german shortrow shaping for the shoulders followed by increases for the neckline stitch marker back piece from the rs pick up and knit 18 18 18 18 21 21 24 24 24 sts from the left shoulder of the back piece you should be picking up from the stitch marker to the corner row 1 ws p to end turn row 2 rs k2 turn row 3 make a ds p to end turn wan cheng phua © copyright 2024 knittygrittysg com row 4 k to previous ds k2tog k3 turn row 5 make a ds p to end turn repeat the last two row 4 4 4 4 5 5 6 6 6 more times next row k to previous ds k2tog k1 turn next row p to end turn moving on to neckline increases row 1 rs k1 m1l k to end turn row 2 ws p to end turn repeat these two row 4 4 5 5 5 5 5 5 5 more times you should have 23 23 24 24 27 27 30 30 30 sts break the yarn place sts on stitch holder front right shoulder stitch marker back piece from the rs pick up and knit 18 18 18 18 21 21 24 24 24 sts from the right shoulder of the back piece you should be picking up from the corner to the stitch marker row 1 ws p2 turn row 2 rs make a ds k to end turn row 3
